response.overview: This video describes the most effective ways to use your most powerful drives, to rediscover your inborn ability, long denied, for natural magic. Whatever your orientation, learn how to generate power through sex. Gavin Frost has been a leading researcher in this area. Using an extension of techniques he learned in England and India, he tells all. He and Yvonne have investigated Tantric techniques for raising kundalini ground-breaking book Tantric Yoga, the Royal Path continues to sell as well in India as it does in the west. Want more success in your circle work? Learn how sex can power a ritual and alter states of consciousness.
response.title: Sex, Magic, And Tantra
